verses.verse: They <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H2005>If<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> put <S%H7971>away<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H802>wife,<s%> and she <S%H1980>go<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H854><s%> him, and <S%H1961>become<s%> <S%H312>another<s%> <S%H376>man's,<s%> shall he <S%H7725>return<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> her <S%H5750>again?<s%> shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H776>land<s%> be greatly <S%H2610>polluted?<s%> <S%H2610><s%> but <S%H859>thou<s%> hast played the <S%H2181>harlot<s%> with <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H7453>lovers;<s%> yet <S%H7725>return<s%> again <S%H413>to<s%> me, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

Lift <S%H5375>up<s%> thine <S%H5869>eyes<s%> <S%H5921>unto<s%> the high <S%H8205>places,<s%> and <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H375>where<s%> thou hast <S%H3808>not<s%> been <S%H7901>lain<s%> with. <S%H5921>In<s%> the <S%H1870>ways<s%> hast thou <S%H3427>sat<s%> for them, as the <S%H6163>Arabian<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness;<s%> and thou hast <S%H2610>polluted<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> with thy <S%H2184>whoredoms<s%> and with thy <S%H7451>wickedness.<s%>

Therefore the <S%H7241>showers<s%> have been <S%H4513>withheld,<s%> and there hath <S%H1961>been<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> latter <S%H4456>rain;<s%> and thou hadst a <S%H802>whore's<s%> <S%H2181><s%> <S%H4696>forehead,<s%> thou <S%H3985>refusedst<s%> to be <S%H3637>ashamed.<s%>
Wilt thou <S%H3808>not<s%> from this <S%H4480>time<s%> <S%H6258><s%> <S%H7121>cry<s%> unto me, My <S%H1>father,<s%> <S%H859>thou<s%> art the <S%H441>guide<s%> of my <S%H5271>youth?<s%>

Will he <S%H5201>reserve<s%> his anger <S%H5769>forever?<s%> will he <S%H8104>keep<s%> it to the <S%H5331>end?<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> thou hast <S%H1696>spoken<s%> and <S%H6213>done<s%> evil <S%H7451>things<s%> as thou <S%H3201>couldest.<s%>

The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> also <S%H413>unto<s%> me in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H2977>Josiah<s%> the <S%H4428>king,<s%> Hast thou <S%H7200>seen<s%> that <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H4878>backsliding<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> hath <S%H6213>done?<s%> <S%H1931>she<s%> is gone <S%H1980>up<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H1364>high<s%> <S%H2022>mountain<s%> and <S%H8478>under<s%> <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H7488>green<s%> <S%H6086>tree,<s%> and <S%H8033>there<s%> hath played the <S%H2181>harlot.<s%>

And I <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> she had <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> things, <S%H7725>Turn<s%> thou <S%H413>unto<s%> me. But she <S%H7725>returned<s%> <S%H3808>not.<s%> And her <S%H901>treacherous<s%> <S%H269>sister<s%> <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> it.

And I <S%H7200>saw,<s%> <S%H3588>when<s%> <S%H5921>for<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H182>causes<s%> <S%H834>whereby<s%> <S%H4878>backsliding<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> committed <S%H5003>adultery<s%> I had put her <S%H7971>away,<s%> and <S%H5414>given<s%> <S%H413><s%> <S%H853>her<s%> a <S%H5612>bill<s%> of <S%H3748>divorce;<s%> yet her <S%H898>treacherous<s%> <S%H269>sister<s%> <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H3372>feared<s%> <S%H3808>not,<s%> but <S%H1980>went<s%> and played the <S%H2181>harlot<s%> <S%H1571>also.<s%>

And it came to <S%H1961>pass<s%> through the <S%H4480>lightness<s%> <S%H6963><s%> of her <S%H2184>whoredom,<s%> that she <S%H2610>defiled<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H776>land,<s%> and committed <S%H5003>adultery<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> <S%H68>stones<s%> and <S%H854>with<s%> <S%H6086>stocks.<s%>

And <S%H1571>yet<s%> for <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H2063>this<s%> her <S%H901>treacherous<s%> <S%H269>sister<s%> <S%H3063>Judah<s%> hath <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H7725>turned<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> me with her <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H3820>heart,<s%> <S%H3588>but<s%> <S%H518><s%> <S%H8267>feignedly,<s%> <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> me, The <S%H4878>backsliding<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> hath <S%H6663>justified<s%> <S%H5315>herself<s%> more than <S%H4480>treacherous<s%> <S%H898><s%> <S%H3063>Judah.<s%>

Go <S%H1980><s%> and <S%H7121>proclaim<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H1697>words<s%> toward the <S%H6828>north,<s%> and <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H7725>Return,<s%> thou <S%H4878>backsliding<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> and I will <S%H3808>not<s%> cause mine <S%H6440>anger<s%> to <S%H5307>fall<s%> upon you: <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> am <S%H2623>merciful,<s%> <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and I will <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H5201>keep<s%> anger <S%H5769>forever.<s%>

Only <S%H389><s%> <S%H3045>acknowledge<s%> thine <S%H5771>iniquity,<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> thou hast <S%H6586>transgressed<s%> against the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God,<s%> and hast <S%H6340>scattered<s%> <S%H853><s%> thy <S%H1870>ways<s%> to the <S%H2114>strangers<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H7488>green<s%> <S%H6086>tree,<s%> and ye have <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H8085>obeyed<s%> my <S%H6963>voice,<s%> <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

Turn, <S%H7725><s%> O <S%H7726>backsliding<s%> <S%H1121>children,<s%> <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H595>I<s%> am <S%H1166>married<s%> unto you: and I will <S%H3947>take<s%> you <S%H259>one<s%> of a <S%H4480>city,<s%> <S%H5892><s%> and <S%H8147>two<s%> of a <S%H4480>family,<s%> <S%H4940><s%> and I will <S%H935>bring<s%> you to Zion: <S%H6726><s%>
And I will <S%H5414>give<s%> you <S%H7462>pastors<s%> according to mine <S%H3820>heart,<s%> which shall <S%H7462>feed<s%> you with <S%H1844>knowledge<s%> and <S%H7919>understanding.<s%>

And it shall come to <S%H1961>pass,<s%> <S%H3588>when<s%> ye be <S%H7235>multiplied<s%> and <S%H6509>increased<s%> in the <S%H776>land,<s%> in <S%H1992>those<s%> <S%H3117>days,<s%> <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> they shall <S%H559>say<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5750>more,<s%> The <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall it <S%H5927>come<s%> <S%H5921>to<s%> <S%H3820>mind:<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall they <S%H2142>remember<s%> it; <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall they <S%H6485>visit<s%> it; <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall that be <S%H6213>done<s%> any <S%H5750>more.<s%>

At <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H6256>time<s%> they shall <S%H7121>call<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> the <S%H3678>throne<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1471>nations<s%> shall be <S%H6960>gathered<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> it, to the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> to <S%H3389>Jerusalem:<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall they <S%H1980>walk<s%> any <S%H5750>more<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H8307>imagination<s%> of their <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H3820>heart.<s%>

In <S%H1992>those<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> shall <S%H1980>walk<s%> <S%H5921>with<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and they shall <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H3162>together<s%> out of the <S%H4480>land<s%> <S%H776><s%> of the <S%H6828>north<s%> <S%H5921>to<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> I have given for an <S%H5157>inheritance<s%> <S%H853>unto<s%> your <S%H1>fathers.<s%>

But <S%H595>I<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H349>How<s%> shall I <S%H7896>put<s%> thee among the <S%H1121>children,<s%> and <S%H5414>give<s%> thee a <S%H2532>pleasant<s%> <S%H776>land,<s%> a <S%H6643>goodly<s%> <S%H5159>heritage<s%> of the <S%H6635>hosts<s%> of <S%H1471>nations?<s%> and I <S%H559>said,<s%> Thou shalt <S%H7121>call<s%> me, My <S%H1>father;<s%> and shalt <S%H3808>not<s%> turn <S%H7725>away<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H310><s%> me.

Surely <S%H403><s%> as a <S%H802>wife<s%> treacherously <S%H898>departeth<s%> from her <S%H4480>husband,<s%> <S%H1167><s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> have ye dealt <S%H898>treacherously<s%> with me, O <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

A <S%H6963>voice<s%> was <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the high <S%H8205>places,<s%> <S%H1065>weeping<s%> and <S%H8469>supplications<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> they have <S%H5753>perverted<s%> <S%H853><s%> their <S%H1870>way,<s%> and they have <S%H7911>forgotten<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> their <S%H430>God.<s%>

Return, <S%H7725><s%> ye <S%H7726>backsliding<s%> <S%H1121>children,<s%> and I will <S%H7495>heal<s%> your <S%H4878>backslidings.<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> we <S%H857>come<s%> unto thee; <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H859>thou<s%> art the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> our <S%H430>God.<s%>

Truly <S%H403><s%> in <S%H8267>vain<s%> is salvation hoped for from the <S%H4480>hills,<s%> <S%H1389><s%> and from the <S%H1995>multitude<s%> of <S%H2022>mountains:<s%> <S%H403>truly<s%> in the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%> is the <S%H8668>salvation<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

For <S%H1322>shame<s%> hath <S%H398>devoured<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3018>labor<s%> of our <S%H1>fathers<s%> from our <S%H4480>youth;<s%> <S%H5271><s%> <S%H853><s%> their <S%H6629>flocks<s%> and their <S%H1241>herds,<s%> <S%H853><s%> their <S%H1121>sons<s%> and their <S%H1323>daughters.<s%>

We lie <S%H7901>down<s%> in our <S%H1322>shame,<s%> and our <S%H3639>confusion<s%> <S%H3680>covereth<s%> us: <S%H3588>for<s%> we have <S%H2398>sinned<s%> against the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> our <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H587>we<s%> and our <S%H1>fathers,<s%> from our <S%H4480>youth<s%> <S%H5271><s%> even <S%H5704>unto<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> and have <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H8085>obeyed<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> our <S%H430>God.<s%>
